======How often to heal marines.======

= Description =

This cvar sets the delay between heals. Every heal, it adds the value of <!--[asw_marine_health_regen_amount]-->[[asw_marine_health_regen_amount.wiki|asw_marine_health_regen_amount]] to each marine's health.
